subject: svn commit: samba-docs r1119 - in trunk/smbdotconf/ldap: .
body:
Author: kseeger
Date: 2007-06-04 09:51:07 +0000 (Mon, 04 Jun 2007)
New Revision: 1119

WebSVN: http://websvn.samba.org/cgi-bin/viewcvs.cgi?view=rev&root=samba-docs&rev=1119

Log:
Fix typo: tipical -> typical
Modified:
   trunk/smbdotconf/ldap/ldapsameditposix.xml


Changeset:
Modified: trunk/smbdotconf/ldap/ldapsameditposix.xml
===================================================================
--- trunk/smbdotconf/ldap/ldapsameditposix.xml	2007-06-02 21:13:20 UTC (rev 1118)
+++ trunk/smbdotconf/ldap/ldapsameditposix.xml	2007-06-04 09:51:07 UTC (rev 1119)
@@ -20,7 +20,7 @@
 	provision. To run this command the ldap server must be running, Winindd must be running and
 	the smb.conf ldap options must be properly configured.
 
-	The tipical ldap setup used with the yes option
+	The typical ldap setup used with the yes option
 	is usually sufficient to use yes as well.
